website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics BackBeat Fit Boost Edition headphones may carry an extra charge in their pouch, but are priced far too high for the audio experience they deliver.
pros: Open design allows you to hear your surroundings
cons: Only ships with one pair of eartips

customer_reviews.title: Previously I used the Jaybird X3 but they were not very comfortable for my earshape
customer_reviews.text: I just ran a half marathon with these. They stayed in and at no time during my run did I have any worries of it falling off my ears. Previously I used the Jaybird X3 but they were not very comfortable for my earshape. These earphones let in plenty of noise from your surroundings so if you were looking for noise isolation. These may not be for you. The battery life is amazing. Plus the little charging pouch is cool. If you are looking for good workout bluetooth earphones. I would strongly recommend these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: ive been using back beats for sometime now
customer_reviews.text: this will probably be my final pair of back beats, the batteries doesnt last like its predecessor. i will fully charge it not use it for a weak and when i finally turn it on it say 2 hours left.
customer_reviews.author: Blkknight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for running.
customer_reviews.text: I've run with them for a week now. Great for running! Comfortable and you can still hear cars around you. Great sound. Hasn't fallen out of my ears once (and I get a lot of sweat in my ears). Don't have to hear the vibration of your feet. Hope it withstands the sweat/potential rain in the long-run.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica X

customer_reviews.title: I wish my legs were as good as these
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for two weeks but wow it worked as expected my first few runs were in the rain and last weekend successfully completed a half marathon in rain and sweat. I wish my legs were as good as these. Definitely recommend for folks who sweat a lot or are stuck running in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Unni

customer_reviews.title: Good audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Good audio quality, works for music and phone calls. After a while in without music, can lose bluetooth connection and phone calls end up on the phone. I'm using it with iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: Joerg Furrer

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts or any time
customer_reviews.text: Great head set to workout with, this is my third set (stepped on one, lost the others) so I got one with the charging pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Battery stopped working in two months
customer_reviews.text: Battery quit holding a charge after a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... have been using for a week now and I love it. It has about 8 hours charge life ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for a week now and I love it. It has about 8 hours charge life which is a fantastic to me. The sound system is 5/5. I will re-buy it if they sell this in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the headphones when he is training for his HS Crew Team. Go Prep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have good hearing, its okay to burn some of your ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have good hearing, its okay to burn some of your cochlea on this headset because the sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: RKO Wells

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wireless headphones that stay in place well
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable for running and stay in place well. Sound quality is generally good. These will work with the Garmin Forerunner 645 music provided you wear the watch on the right arm. Otherwise, they are prone to dropouts if the watch is worn on the left arm while running.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Takes practice to get them to fit on your ear right
customer_reviews.text: Do not have to worry about sweating while wearing them to cut grass
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: ... lost one and I think this model is the best for sport
customer_reviews.text: I lost one and I think this model is the best for sport. I choose this one with tue power back up but was surprise not to have the band for the phone as with the previous one. it is a shame for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these, an upgrade from the last ones I had. 8 hrs of play time is excellent
customer_reviews.author: don maher

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell you how it works yet because no instructions
customer_reviews.text: This thing came with 5 different little safety and warranty and promotion pamphlets, but not a single one that tells you how to use the freaking things. There's just one little picture that shows what the buttons do but that's it. Awesome strategy guys. I'm about to YouTube the instructions cause I guess including them with the product is just ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat FIT Black Core Boost Edition Waterproof Wireless Sports Headset
product_meta.description:
With this set you will be able to train longer and harder, because the music will pump you up. Included in the box are Bluetooth sports headphones in black, a waterproof charging case plus a six-month premium membership in PEAR +. Plantronics Backbeat FIT itself is suitable for a wide range of sports thanks to their neck-fastening. They have a sweat-resistant cover and are waterproof, meet IP57 protection requirements. You will listen to music at full charge for up to 8 hours. Headphones can only be recharged for 15 minutes when you are in a hurry, but it will last for an hour of playing.
Key Features Plantronics Backbeat Wireless Headset FIT Black

Sports Bluetooth headset in black
Practical neck attachment
The headphones are waterproof (IP57)
It can last up to 8 hours when fully charged
Backbeat FIT wearing a sweat-resistant cover
Open Headphone Design
The purchase also includes a rechargeable sleeve and a six-month membership in PEAR +
You can find both microphone and controls on Plantronics Backbeat FIT

Sophisticated Bluetooth headphones

You will find both a microphone and a handset for receiving/ changing music on the headphones. When you do sports, you will hear everything around you thanks to their open design, so you don't have to worry about cars for example. The rechargeable sleeve provides up to an additional 10 hours of charging and is waterproof and quick drying. By purchasing Plantronics Backbeat FIT, you also get unlimited access to the 12 PEAR + Personal Coach training sessions plus a six-month PEAR + membership that allows you to enjoy coaching/ advice from world-renowned coaches and athletes.
